author: Tim O'Brien
title: Traffic counters show rise in numbers of cars returning to roads
description: Numbers of vehicles on all major roads rising as Easter approaches, despite Covid-19 ban
content:
As health authorities warn against people in the east of the country heading to holiday homes for the Easter weekend, traffic on the Republics main roads is already showing a significant increases in volumes.
Traffic on the States main roads fell by up to 80… [+2262 chars]
